r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - Add container id header to http transport (Container Tagging) - #552 - Attach exceptions to spans in new API #548
### Changed - Migrate PDO integration to sandbox API #538 - Migrate Eloquent integration to sandbox API #559 - Migrate memcached integration to sandbox API #578 - Migrate elasticsearch integration to sandbox API #562
